All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AI
Chinese Checkers AI
Board
Abstract base class for all boards.
ClassicTheme
A Theme implementation with classic board and piece images.
Coordinates
Represents two dimensional coordinates (row, column)
Launcher
Main class responsible for launching the game.
Menu
Represents the game menu which starts the event loop containing the sub menus and the game.
Minimax
Represents a deterministic AI based on the Minimax algorithm with a randomized final tie breaker.
Mode
Defines the strategy and/or quality of the moves chosen by AI
Move
Represents a move from an origin virtual position to a destination virtual position.
Piece
Represents a Piece type.
Player
Represents a human or AI player.
Position
UI component that represents a position on the board.
SquareBoard
Represents a square shaped board sub class of Board allowing 2 or 4 players.
StarBoard
Represents a 6 corner star shaped board sub class of Board allowing 2, 4 or 6 players.
State
Keeps track of the state of the game.
Theme
Represents a Theme object that holds a set of reusable UI elements.
VirtualPosition
Represents a position on the board.
